entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
